TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ReceiveErrorHandling extends System.Enum

summary.span: 一个指定病毒消息处理的枚举。

span.span: An enumeration that specifies handling for a poison message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果某个消息多次尝试向应用程序传递都以失败告终，则此消息为病毒消息。A poison message is a message that fails repeated attempts to deliver to the application. 这仅在使用基于消息队列 (MSMQ) 的绑定时适用。This is applicable only when using a Message Queuing (MSMQ)-based binding. 默认值为 `Fault`，此时侦听器会出错，ServiceHost 也会因此出错。The default value is `Fault`, which faults the listener and therefore the ServiceHost. 如果服务因为病毒消息而出错，则会引发 。In the case where the service was to fault because of a poison message, a is thrown. 该异常含有 MSMQ 消息的 `LookupId`，可用于通过 System.Messaging API 将消息移除。The exception contains the `LookupId` of the MSMQ message that can be used to move the message out of the way using System.Messaging API. 枚举的某些值，例如 `Reject` 和 `Move` 仅在 [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)] 上可用。Certain values of the enumeration such as `Reject` and `Move` are only available on [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)]. 将 属性设置为该枚举的其中一个值可以控制病毒消息处理。You control poison message handling by setting the property to one of the values of this enumeration. ## Examples 下面的配置代码演示如何在服务配置文件中设置该属性：The following configuration code illustrates how to set this property in the service configuration file: [!code-xml[S_UE_MSMQ_Poison#5](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_msmq_poison/common/serviceapp.config#5)]

related.span: MSMQ 3.0 中的病毒消息处理

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.ReceiveErrorHandling Drop = int32(1)

summary.span: 此选项可删除病毒消息。

span.span: This option drops the poison message.

summary.span: 消息始终没有传递到应用程序。

span.span: The message never gets delivered to the application.

summary.span: 如果此时消息的 TTL 已过期，则此消息就会出现发送端的死信队列中。

span.span: If the message's TTL had already expired at this point, then the message may appear in the sender's Dead Letter Queue.

summary.span: 如果不是这种情况，则该消息将不会显示在任何位置。

span.span: If not, the message does not appear anywhere.

summary.span: 此选项指示用户实际并不在意该消息是否丢失。

span.span: This option indicates that the user does not really care if the message is lost.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 适用的平台：[!INCLUDE[wxp](~/includes/wxp-md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[ws2003](~/includes/ws2003-md.md)] 与 [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)]。Applicable platforms: [!INCLUDE[wxp](~/includes/wxp-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[ws2003](~/includes/ws2003-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.ReceiveErrorHandling Fault = int32(0)

summary.span: 此选项会向导致 ServiceHost 出现错误的侦听器发送一个错误。

span.span: This option sends a fault to the listener that caused the ServiceHost to fault.

summary.span: 必须利用其他一些外部机制将该消息从应用程序中移除，应用程序才能继续处理队列中的消息。

span.span: The message must be removed from the application queue by some external mechanism before the application can continue to process messages from the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 适用的平台：Windows XP、Windows Server 2003 与 Windows Vista。Applicable platforms: Windows XP, Windows Server 2003, and Windows Vista.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.ReceiveErrorHandling Move = int32(3)

summary.span: 选择此选项会将病毒消息移动到病毒消息队列，以供以后由病毒消息处理应用程序进行处理。

span.span: This moves the poison message to a Poison Message Queue for later processing by a poison message handling application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 适用的平台：仅限 [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)]。Applicable platforms: [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)] only.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.ReceiveErrorHandling Reject = int32(2)

summary.span: 选择此选项会指示消息队列 (MSMQ) 将否定确认发送回发送队列管理器，以说明应用程序无法接收此消息。

span.span: This instructs MSMQ to send a negative acknowledgement back to the sending queue manager that the message cannot be received by the application.

summary.span: 该消息会放入发送队列管理器的死信队列中。

span.span: The message is placed in the sending queue manager's Dead Letter Queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 适用的平台：仅限 [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)]。Applicable platforms: [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)] only.
